thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
The Art of the Nuclear Deal
President Trump is set to announce his decision on the Iran nuclear accord today. The 2015 agreement, which he has repeatedly condemned, eased international sanctions on Iran in exchange for curbs to its nuclear program. Washingtonâ€™s European allies were readying themselves for the prospect that the U.S. would withdraw. But some European officials were holding out hope that Mr. Trump, after an exit from the agreement, would move slowly to reimpose sanctions, which would leave more time...
